streamlabs.personnal_header: Notifications for tips and merch made on your personnal account are premium-only. Streamlabs Charity events do NOT require to be premium.
streamlabs.charity_header: Connecting to a campaign makes it possible to use the interactive {OVERLAY} as well as automate action based on donations thanks to Triggers system.
streamlabs.step2: Click "View Team" on the team to connect to
streamlabs.step3: On the "Charity Stream Alerts" select "Alerts" to only get donation events made through your channel
streamlabs.step4: Click "Copy Link" on at the top of the page
streamlabs.step5: Paste the link in the field below:
streamlabs.charity_error:
Cannot get campaign details.
Make sure you specified the right URL.
URL must look like this "https://streamlabscharity.com/teams/{'@'}..."
